Description: With more than 200 undergraduate student participants every year, the Undergraduate Student Caucus Poster Competition continues to be the premier event for undergraduate students attending the AACR Annual Meeting. Now in its 17th year, this session gives undergraduates the opportunity to learn more about current research in the cancer field, hear from investigators about educational pathways and career development, explore career options in the cancer field, and compete for monetary prizes while presenting research. Undergraduates at all levels are welcome to participate without cost.
SearchResultBody: PAS08. 17th Annual AACR Undergraduate Student Caucus and Poster Competition (USCPC)
Title: 17th Annual AACR Undergraduate Student Caucus and Poster Competition (USCPC)
